description: The schema definition for the HPE extended properties of a memory module.

MemoryChunkSizePercentage.description: Size of chunk in percent of total capacity.
MemoryChunkSizePercentage.longDescription: Property used during creation of this chunk to indicate the requested size as a percent of total capacity.
